Pre-Game Insights: The Kansas City Royals and the New York Yankees meet Monday in MLB action from Yankee Stadium.
This will be the first installment in a three-game series.
Carlos Rodon (14-9) with a 4.08 ERA will start for the Yankees, while Brady Singer (9-10) with a 3.35 ERA will start for the Royals.
The Yankees' recent form includes winning two out of three games against the Chicago Cubs.
The Royals' recent form includes sweeping the Minnesota Twins in a three-game series.
Betting odds favor the New York Yankees at -179, with the Kansas City Royals at +151.
The over/under for the game is set at 8 runs.
